descriptionHtml:
[youtube]D-zvVmDeLkE[/youtube]

This is a video featuring the Alpha testing stage of my custom follower mod for Skyrim.
At the moment no updates OR DLC will be required to install and use this mod.There\'s still a lot of work to do and any of the videos about this will be constantly coming out through the development process cataloging features of the mod.

Checklist;

Make Follower Ready : ?

Give personality : ?

Custom Combat Behavior : ?

Finalize Clothing :

Finalize Model :

Finalize Skill set :

Customize Dialogue :

Custom Audio w/ Dialogue :

Unique Dagger :

Unique Bow :

Master Trainer (Stealth or Marksman) :

Trader (lockpicks, poisons, etc.) :


This video DOES NOT feature the final appearance, that is just a placeholder appearance for now. His personality however is finished. He acts like the master thief/assassin that he is. He\'s fast, cunning, quick to take cover, and quick with a bow and blade. He also is already capable of going full stealth with you while holding his own when the fight breaks out.
author: Crux
